00027 // Could not initialize simsignal_t it here!? I got the POST_MODEL_CHANGE id!?
00028 const simsignalwrap_t BaseModule::catHostStateSignal = simsignalwrap_t(MIXIM_SIGNAL_HOSTSTATE_NAME);
00029 
00030 BaseModule::BaseModule()
00031   : cSimpleModule()
00032   , cListener()
00033   , debug(false)
00034   , notAffectedByHostState(true)
00035 {}
00036 
00037 BaseModule::BaseModule(unsigned stacksize)
00038   : cSimpleModule(stacksize)
00039   , cListener()
00040   , debug(false)
00041   , notAffectedByHostState(true)
00042 {}
00043 
00051 void BaseModule::initialize(int stage) {
00052     if (stage == 0) {
00053       notAffectedByHostState =  hasPar("notAffectedByHostState")
00054                  && par("notAffectedByHostState").boolValue();
00055         hasPar("debug") ? debug = par("debug").boolValue() : debug = true;
00056         findHost()->subscribe(catHostStateSignal, this);
00057     }
00058 }
00059 
00060 void BaseModule::receiveSignal(cComponent */*source*/, simsignal_t signalID, cObject *obj) {
00061   Enter_Method_Silent();
00062   if (signalID == catHostStateSignal) {
00063     const HostState *const pHostState = dynamic_cast<const HostState *const>(obj);
00064     if (pHostState) {
00065       handleHostState(*pHostState);
00066     }
00067     else {
00068       opp_warning("Got catHostStateSignal but obj was not a HostState pointer?");
00069     }
00070   }
00071 }
00072 
00073 void BaseModule::handleHostState(const HostState& state)
00074 {
00075   if(notAffectedByHostState)
00076     return;
00077 
00078   if(state.get() != HostState::ACTIVE) {
00079     error("Hosts state changed to something else than active which"
00080         " is not handled by this module. Either handle this state"
00081         " correctly or if this module really isn't affected by the"
00082         " hosts state set the parameter \"notAffectedByHostState\""
00083         " of this module to true.");
00084   }
00085 }
00086 
00087 void BaseModule::switchHostState(HostState::States state)
00088 {
00089   HostState hostState(state);
00090   emit(catHostStateSignal, &hostState);
00091 }
00092 
00093 cModule* BaseModule::findHost(void)
00094 {
00095   return FindModule<>::findHost(this);
00096 }
00097 
00098 const cModule* BaseModule::findHost(void) const
00099 {
00100   return FindModule<>::findHost(this);
00101 }

00130 
00131 std::string BaseModule::logName(void) const
00132 {
00133   std::ostringstream ost;
00134   if (hasPar("logName")) // let modules override
00135   {
00136     ost << par("logName").stringValue();
00137   }
00138   else
00139   {
00140     const cModule *const parent = findHost();
00141     parent->hasPar("logName") ?
00142       ost << parent->par("logName").stringValue() : ost << parent->getName();
00143     ost << "[" << parent->getIndex() << "]";
00144   }
00145   return ost.str();
00146 }
